ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Wrappers around the 'xml2' and 'httr' packages to make it easy to download, then manipulate, HTML and XML.
Wrappers around the 'xml2' and 'httr' packages to make it easy to download, then manipulate, HTML and XML.

name: r-rvest
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rvest
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rvest_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rvest/rvest_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1e7c34a0b4467887195b1cd66388919989e82ca096d08df283c675d87e53bc00

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-glue
    - r-httr >=0.5
    - r-lifecycle >=1.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang >=1.0.0
    - r-selectr
    - r-tibble
    - r-withr
    - r-xml2 >=1.3
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-glue
    - r-httr >=0.5
    - r-lifecycle >=1.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang >=1.0.0
    - r-selectr
    - r-tibble
    - r-withr
    - r-xml2 >=1.3

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rvest')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rvest')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://rvest.tidyverse.org/, https://github.com/tidyverse/rvest
  license: MIT
  summary: Wrappers around the 'xml2' and 'httr' packages to make it easy to download, then manipulate, HTML and XML.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: rvest
# Title: Easily Harvest (Scrape) Web Pages
# Version: 0.3.4
# Authors@R:  c(person(given = "Hadley", family = "Wickham", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "hadley@rstudio.com"), person(given = "RStudio", role = "cph"))
# Description: Wrappers around the 'xml2' and 'httr' packages to make it easy to download, then manipulate, HTML and XML.
# License: GPL-3
# URL: http://rvest.tidyverse.org/, https://github.com/tidyverse/rvest
# BugReports: https://github.com/tidyverse/rvest/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.2), xml2
# Imports: httr (>= 0.5), magrittr, selectr
# Suggests: covr, knitr, png, rmarkdown, spelling, stringi (>= 0.3.1), testthat
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Language: en-US
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-15 19:45:39 UTC; hadley
# Author: Hadley Wickham [aut, cre], RStudio [cph]
# Maintainer: Hadley Wickham <hadley@rstudio.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-15 20:10:30 UTC
